game.title: The Missing Codex
game.objective: Find the missing Codex of Secrets.
game.description: The Codex of Secrets is a powerful artifact that holds the key to unlocking the secrets of the universe. It was stolen from the Temple of Knowledge by a group of cultists, and it is up to you to find it and return it to its rightful place.
game.reward: The Codex of Secrets, 10,000 gold, and the respect of the people of the realm.

task.objective: Travel to the Temple of Knowledge.
task.description: The Temple of Knowledge is located in the mountains to the north of the kingdom. It is a sacred place, and you will need to be respectful when you approach it.
task.location: Mountains to the north of the kingdom

task.objective: Find the hidden entrance to the Codex Vault.
task.description: The Codex Vault is hidden beneath the Temple of Knowledge. You will need to uncover a secret map to locate it.
task.location: Beneath the Temple of Knowledge, Secret Map Required

task.objective: Defeat the guardian of the Codex Vault.
task.description: A powerful illusionary creature guards the entrance. Be cautious!

task.objective: Return the Codex of Secrets to Archmage Adran.
task.description: Deliver the Codex to the Great Hall in the capital city for safekeeping.
